Google Scholar Site


Inspiring Children’s Futures

Research


PhD thesis
  • My current doctoral research focuses on the role of education in social mobility in the UK. Using data from the British Household Panel Survey, I am estimating intergenerational income mobility in the UK, seeing to what extent educational attainment plays a mediating and moderating role.
Previous research

  • Shaping Social Mobility: Education & Employment- Conference Briefing, Cumberland Lodge, 2022

  • School Absenteeism and Educational Attainment- Evidence from the Scottish Longitudinal Study, University of Strathclyde, 2022.
